name: The Wonders of Veria
description:
Have you ever wanted to explore a planet yourself? Now's your chance! In The Wonders of Veria, you'll fight monsters alongside wizards, strange rabbits, and glowing lizards! Set out into a vast, uncharted world, with your only your wits and companions to guide you.

Explore 3 levels of Veria today, including a curious island, a mysterious cave, and an enchanted forest!
